page.title: 19Clubs in Wilton Area
page.content: There are clubs catering for all ages & for a wide range of interests in the Wilton Area. There is, for example, a branch of the British Legion & of St.John's Ambulance;an Old Time Dance Club and a Young Wives' Group.People who enjoy physical activity are very well provided for. Westwood St.Thomas School has a Sports Centre with facilities for badminton, fencing, athletics, fitness training, hockey, netball, archery, table tennis, football, cricket, karate, squash & gymnastics. Elsewhere in the area there is riding, bowling & golf. Young people can join the Brownies, Cubs, Guides,Scouts,Rangers or Army Cadets & local churches run youth clubs such as the Shell Group & Saturday Special.The Floral Arrangement Club,the Wilton Arts Group and the Local History Society cater for varied interests.
